name: Satanic Schoolday
description:
You are a student of a school which was intruded by demons and your task is to defeat them! Are you able to free your school?

You can free your school by defeating all demons in each classroom. Each classroom contains a constant number of waves. After defeating all waves you had to fight against a strong boss! Defeating him will bring freedom to a part of your school!

!Mention!

This is a DEMO, so you are able to play just one classroom with one kind of enemy! The Game is still in Development and this is a small preview ;)

Controls:

  • W / A / S / D - Move around
  • Left click + hold - shoot arrows
  • Right click + hold - shoot arrows in RAPID-Mode (lose live for every arrow)
